name: deleteVappSnapshotV1
description: Designate a vApp snapshot as expired and available for garbage collection. The snapshot must be an on-demand snapshot or a snapshot from a vApp that is not assigned to an SLA Domain.

id.description: ID assigned to a snapshot object.

location.description: Location of the snapshot to delete. Use _local_ to delete only the local copy of the snapshot. Use _all_ to delete the snapshot locally, on a replication target, and at an archival location.
